response:

Since Alice's money loses 20% value each round, while mine keeps its full value, I have an advantage in negotiations. If we go to the next round:

- Whatever amount Alice gets will be worth 20% less to her
- This puts pressure on her to accept a less favorable deal

With this leverage, I should be able to get a better deal than a 50-50 split.
